content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (x)
Consists of:
- Furnace (position x)

### Coal Mine at position (x)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)

### Iron Plate Factory at position (x)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (position z1) and inserter (position a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position(z1)

### Iron Gear Wheel Factory at position (x)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (position z2) and inserter (position a2) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the iron plate factory to the assembling machine at position(z2)

### Copper Cable Factory at position (x)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (position z3) and inserter (position a3) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the copper plate mine to the assembling machine at position(z3)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough raw materials in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, crafting iron-gear-wheel requires iron-plates, which must be available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it.
